description.en: Meticulous restoration of original tessellated verandah and hallway tiles in a Victorian-era home in Kew. Sourced matching reproduction tiles, re-levelled the substrate, repaired border details, and sealed the entire floor to preserve its period character.
description.zh: Kew维多利亚时期住宅门廊和走廊原始花砖的精心修复。采购匹配复刻瓷砖、重新找平基底、修复边框细节，并对整体地面进行密封处理以保留时代特色。
